pr_title: HADOOP-17444. ADLS Gen1: Updating gen1 SDK version from 2.3.6 to 2.3.9

timeline.message: Updating gen1 SDK version from 2.3.6 to 2.3.9

timeline.bodyText: why this one now given we have had this dependency forever but have not required this?
timeline.author: vinaysbadami

replies.bodyText:
2.3.9 version of SDK is expecting wildfly dependency.
without the same, nearly all the tests were failing with the following exception.
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class com.microsoft.azure.datalake.store.SSLSocketFactoryEx
replies.author: bilaharith

replies.bodyText:
is there some issue with your local build?
Because it should pull in hadoop-project's pom dependencies (
  
    
      hadoop/hadoop-project/pom.xml
    
    
         Line 1450
      in
      df35c7f
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <dependency> 
        
    
  

) since gen1 driver pom does depend on hadoop-project pom.
replies.author: rahuldutta90

replies.bodyText: just because hadoop-project declares an artifact doesn't mean it comes in on the classpath. hadoop-common compiles with it but doesn't force it downstream, so modules which needed it do have to declare it.
replies.author: steveloughran
